Title: The Turing Enigma

Title: Amos & Andrew
Summary: A Pulitzer prize writer buys a cabin. The neighbors get suspicious when a stranger "breaks in". They see a black man and call the police.who start shooting at him. The sheriff tries a cover-up involving a white petty crook. Bad idea.
